name: Burning Brazier of Elf
description: Upon attacking an enemy, there is a {0}% chance to recover 1 MP.
story: A mysterious brazier crafted by ancient Elves to honor the mother nature. It is the pinnacle of their magic, capable of producing an infinite amount of mana.

name: Drinking Horn of Ancient Cow
description: Normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase ATK by {0}% and ATK Spd by {1} for 10 sec.
story: A glass made from the horn of a sacred bull that roams the sky. It is a magical drinking horn that embodies the essence of abundance.

name: Dice of Magical Letters
description: Normal attacks have a 3% chance to deal {0}% M.DMG.
story: A die used in an ancient civilization for divination. Each face is engraved with mysterious illegible letters.

name: Golden Cat Statue
description: At the beginning of each battle, increases ATK Spd by {0} for 15 sec.
story: A curious golden statue in the shape of a golden cat, the symbol of good fortune. Sometimes it seems as if the cat is waving its paw.

name: Pocket Watch of Ancient Civilization
description: Reduces Cooldown of self's all Skills by {0} sec every 10 sec and increases ATK Spd by {1} for 5 sec.
story: A pocket watch that can fast-forward time slightly to provide a quick glimpse of one's destiny. Excessive use may prove to be quite dangerous.

name: Primer for the Heroes
description: When HP is 20% or below, increases ATK by {0}%, and increases ATK Spd and All DMG Reduction by {1}.
story: This primer, which chronicles the stories of past heroes, is considered a bible for any new hero. It's written in ancient letters.

name: The Ancient Scope
description: When MP is at 100%, Crit Chance and ACC rise by {0} for {1} sec. Has a cooldown of {2} sec.
story: A scope created by an ancient technomagi. A useful tool that can zoom into a faraway object to a good level of detail.

name: Roaring Tiger Statue
description: When your HP falls to 35% or lower, deals Physical Damage equal to 100% of Attack to nearby enemies and knocks them down. Enemies hit have their Attack reduced by {0}% and Attack Speed reduced by {1} for 10 seconds. This effect has a 30-second cooldown.
story: An eerie gold statue designed after a roaring tiger. Under the right conditions, the tiger wakes up and makes everything around it tremble in fear.

name: Golden Apple of a Goddess
description: When the hero's HP falls below 25%, recover {0}% of max HP and dispel all negative effects. Activates 1 time only.
story: It's said to be one of the sacred artifacts bestowed by the goddess. A miraculous remedy said to heal any injury.

name: Golden Mask of Ancient King
description: Upon taking a hit, there is a 5% chance to gain invulnerability to all DMG for {0} sec. Has a cooldown of 5 sec.
story: A golden mask once worn by God King of the desert. It is enchanted with the spell of absolute authority to protect its owner.

name: Madame's Bronze Mirrors
description: Increases own M.Block Chance by {0} and M.DMG Reduction by {1}.
story: A bronze mirror of an Ancient Technomagic Kingdom that a genius wizard gifted to his wife. It is inscribed with a rune for protecting a loved one.

name: Sealed Chain of Ancient God
description: Every {0} sec, cast Silence to a random enemy for {1} sec and remove positive effects.
story: A chain said to be once used by the God King of the desert to fetter his slaves. Those who are restrained by this chain cannot resist at all.

name: Mask of Goblin
description: ATK upon Goblins increase by {0} %, and DMG resistance against Goblins increases by {1} %
story: A mask modeled after the face of a Goblin. It's actually kind of cute.

name: Mask of Harpy
description: ATK upon Harpies increase by {0} %, and DMG resistance against Harpies increases by {1} %
story: A mask modeled after the face of a Harpy. The sound of a brisk wind can be heard.

name: Mask of Orc
description: ATK upon Orcs increase by {0} %, and DMG resistance against Orcs increases by {1} %
story: A mask modeled after the face of an Orc. It inspires a brutish desire for combat.

name: Undead Mask
description: Increases DMG to Undead by {0} % and Resistance against Undead by {1}%.
story: A mask modeled after the face of a Skeleton. It smells like death.

name: Soul Spring Water
description: At the beginning of each battle, heals {0}% HP and recovers {1}% Mana.
story: One drop of it is said to become available every hundred years at the Soul Spring. A very rare and effective panacea.

name: Talismans of Resistance
description: Upon receiving a negative effect, removes all negative effects. Afterward, gains immunity to CC for {0} sec. Has a Cooldown of {1} sec.
story: A pile of old exotic talismans that drives away harmful spirits. They are rendered useless for a while once used.

name: Judgment of Light Bracelet
description: ACC and CC ACC rise by {0}.
story: A blessed bracelet once created by the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua. It's an antique magic tool, and only a few like this remain today.
